location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '30'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Bahrein (Bahrain) of the ‘Tombs’, burial mounds dating to the Dilmun, Umm an-Nar and later cultures. At right three donkeys are tethered, with a man standing alongside one of them. At centre a man appears to be kneeling, perhaps praying.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Bahrein.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘30’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘The Tombs.’, ‘(Feb. 1918)’
